rice.name: Basmati Rice
rice.description: Premium long-grain basmati rice with exceptional aroma and taste
rice.details: High-quality basmati rice sourced from the best farms. Perfect for biryanis, pilafs, and everyday cooking.

rice.name: Sella Rice
rice.description: Parboiled sella rice with golden hue and unique cooking properties
rice.details: Traditionally processed sella rice that maintains texture during cooking. Ideal for fried rice and risotto.

rice.name: Brown Rice
rice.description: Nutrient-rich brown rice with wholesome flavor
rice.details: Unpolished rice retaining all bran and germ layers. High in fiber and essential nutrients.

rice.name: Long Grain Rice
rice.description: Extra-long grain white rice with perfect cooking consistency
rice.details: Premium long-grain rice with superior quality. Non-sticky and fluffy texture.

marbles.name: White Marble
marbles.description: Pure white marble with elegant veining patterns
marbles.details: Premium white marble sourced from renowned quarries. Perfect for luxury interiors and architectural projects.

marbles.name: Italian Marble
marbles.description: Authentic Italian marble with distinctive character
marbles.details: Imported Italian marble known for durability and timeless beauty. Ideal for premium construction and design.

marbles.name: Granite
marbles.description: Durable granite with rich color variations
marbles.details: High-quality granite resistant to scratching and heat. Available in various colors and finishes.

marbles.name: Onyx Marble
marbles.description: Luxurious onyx marble with translucent quality
marbles.details: Premium onyx marble with unique light-transmitting properties. Creates stunning visual effects in design.
